name: Full Plate
description:
Grant 2 Shield points to your active character.
Before this Shield is fully consumed, the Physical DMG you take is halved. (The figure will be rounded up)
descriptionraw: Grant <color=#FFFFFFFF>2 $[K6] points</color> to your active character.\nBefore this $[K6] is fully consumed, the $[K100] you take is halved. (The figure will be rounded up)
